questions.question_hindi: मौर्य कालमें शिक्षा का प्रमुख केन्द्र क्या था?
questions.subject: इतिहास (History)
questions.question_english: What was the main center of education during the Maurya period?
questions.explanation_english: During the Mauryan era (4th–2nd century BCE), Taxila emerged as a prominent center of learning and education. It was established as a university by Chanakya (Kautilya), the chief minister of Chandragupta Maurya. Taxila offered education in various subjects like politics, economics, medicine, and philosophy. While Nalanda became a major educational hub during the Gupta period, it was Taxila that dominated the Mauryan era. Vaishali and Ujjain were important political and commercial centers but not primarily known for education.
questions.explanation_hindi: मौर्य काल में (ईसा पूर्व 4वीं-2वीं शताब्दी) तक्षशिला शिक्षा का प्रमुख केंद्र था। इसे मौर्य साम्राज्य के प्रधानमंत्री चाणक्य द्वारा स्थापित किया गया था। तक्षशिला में राजनीति, अर्थशास्त्र, चिकित्सा और दर्शन जैसे विषयों का अध्ययन किया जाता था। नालंदा गुप्त काल में महत्वपूर्ण शैक्षिक केंद्र बना, जबकि वैशाली और उज्जैन राजनीतिक और वाणिज्यिक शहर थे।
questions.topic: Ancient Indian History - Education in the Maurya Period
key_facts: Taxila was established as a university by Chanakya during the Mauryan era.
Nalanda became prominent as an educational center during the Gupta period (4th–6th century CE).

questions.question_hindi: 1857 के विद्रोहका रुहेलखण्ड में नेतृत्व किसने किया था?
questions.subject: इतिहास (History)
questions.question_english: Who led the revolt of 1857 in Rohilkhand?
questions.explanation_english: Khan Bahadur Khan was a prominent leader of the 1857 revolt in Rohilkhand. He was the nephew of Mughal Emperor Bahadur Shah Zafar and led the rebellion in Bareilly, a key region in Rohilkhand. His leadership was significant in mobilizing local forces against British rule. Other options like Shahzada Firoz Khan and Raja Beni Madho Singh were associated with different regions or groups during the revolt.
questions.explanation_hindi: खान बहादुर खाँ 1857 के विद्रोह में रुहेलखण्ड के महत्वपूर्ण नेता थे। वे मुग़ल सम्राट बहादुर शाह जफर के भतीजे थे और बरेली (जो रुहेलखण्ड के एक महत्वपूर्ण क्षेत्र में है) में विद्रोह का नेतृत्व किया। अन्य विकल्प जैसे शहज़ादा फ़िरोज़ ख़ाँ और राजा बेनी माधोसिंह अन्य क्षेत्रों या समूहों से जुड़े थे।
key_facts: Khan Bahadur Khan led the revolt in Bareilly, a key region of Rohilkhand during 1857.
He was a relative of Mughal Emperor Bahadur Shah Zafar and played a significant role in organizing resistance against British rule.

questions.subject: इतिहास (History)
questions.explanation_english: Aurangzeb adopted the title 'Alamgir' (meaning 'Conqueror of the World') to signify his expansionist policies and the vast territorial conquests of the Mughal Empire during his reign (1658–1707). This title reflected his ambition to consolidate power and expand the empire to its greatest extent.
questions.explanation_hindi: औरंगजेब ने 'आलमगीर' (अर्थात 'विश्व का विजेता') उपाधि अपनाई, जो उनके विस्तारवादी नीति और मुग़ल साम्राज्य के भूगोलीय विस्तार को दर्शाता है। यह उपाधि उनके शासन काल (1658-1707) में साम्राज्य के अधिकतम विस्तार को दर्शाती है।
key_facts: Aurangzeb's title 'Alamgir' symbolized his military conquests and expansion of the Mughal Empire.
He ruled from 1658 to 1707, during which the empire reached its largest territorial extent.

questions.question_hindi: पटनाको प्रान्तीय राजधानी किस राजा ने बनाया था?
questions.subject: इतिहास (History)
questions.question_english: Who made Patna the provincial capital?
questions.explanation_english: Sher Shah Suri established Patna as the provincial capital in the 16th century. He founded the Sur Empire after defeating the Mughal emperor Humayun and made Patna (then called Shergarh) his capital. Dara Shikoh was a Mughal prince, Ibrahim Lodi was the last ruler of the Delhi Sultanate, and Babur founded the Mughal Empire but did not establish Patna as a capital.
questions.explanation_hindi: शेरशाह सूरी ने 16वीं शताब्दी में पटना को प्रान्तीय राजधानी बनाया। उन्होंने मुग़ल सम्राट हुमायूं को हराकर सूर राजवंश की स्थापना की और पटना (जिसे शेरगढ़ कहा जाता था) को अपनी राजधानी बनाया। दारा शिकोह मुग़ल साम्राज्य के एक राजकुमार थे, इब्राहिम लोदी दिल्ली सल्तनत के अंतिम शासक थे, और बाबर मुग़ल साम्राज्य की स्थापना करे लेकिन पटना को राजधानी नहीं बनाया।
key_facts: Sher Shah Suri founded the Sur Empire and established Patna as his capital in the 16th century.
Dara Shikoh was a Mughal prince and not associated with Patna's establishment as a capital.

questions.question_hindi: मुग़लसम्राटअकबरके समय का प्रसिद्ध चित्रकार कौन था?
questions.subject: इतिहास (History)
questions.question_english: Who was the famous painter during the reign of Mughal Emperor Akbar?
questions.explanation_english: Bishandas was a renowned painter in the court of Mughal Emperor Akbar. He was part of the Mughal school of painting, which flourished during Akbar's reign. Abul Fazl, on the other hand, was a prominent historian and court scholar, not a painter. Dashavat and Ustad Masud are not historically recognized as major painters of Akbar's era.
questions.explanation_hindi: मुग़ल सम्राट अकबर के दरबार में बिशनदास एक प्रसिद्ध चित्रकार थे। वे मुग़ल चित्रकला के विकास में योगदानकर्ता थे। अबुल फ़ज़ल एक इतिहासकार थे, जबकि दशवत और उस्ताद मसूर अकबर के युग में महत्वपूर्ण चित्रकार नहीं थे।
key_facts: Bishandas was a key figure in the Mughal painting school established under Akbar.
Abul Fazl served as Akbar's court historian, not a painter.
